request.description:
# example-1
* not fetching subjects
* so Student4Resolver class won't be called

# example-2
* fetching subjects
* so Student4Resolver class will be called

# 3 Steps to declare variable
* Add variable in JSON section below Graphql body section
* Give variable data type after `query`
```
$id: Int
```
* Use variable in actual query
